mapper.select: SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(word, ',', 1), ',', -1) as ck_word1, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(word, ',', 2), ',', -1) as ck_word2, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(word, ',', 3), ',', -1) as ck_word3 FROM ck_word WHERE fk = #{num}
SELECT * FROM ck_word A LEFT JOIN ck_store B ON A.fk = B.num WHERE A.word LIKE '%${word}%'
